Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Lizardfolk makes 2 attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Change Shape, The Lizardfolk magically polymorphs into a crocodile.  It can revert to its true form as a bonus action

Abilities.Ability 1: Hold Breath, The Lizardfolk can hold its breath for about 15 minutes
Abilities.Ability 2: Spellcasting, The Lizardfolk is a 5th level spellcaster with a number of Druid spells prepared
